name: Buildy Stacky 2
description: In this wacky and challenging game, players use building segments to construct tall towers that defy gravity and logic. From absurd shapes to unconventional materials, every segment has its own unique twist that will keep players on their toes. But it's not just about building - players can also use special powers to stabilize segments, detonate them, shrink or grow them, and make them stick. As they progress through the levels, players will face increasingly difficult challenges that will test their construction skills and strategic thinking. With a blend of wacky, brain-teasing gameplay, and creative powers, this game is sure to delight players of all ages and skill levels.
